Did you play any of these clam case titles from #Activision on the #ZXSpectrum back in the day? All from1983-84. For me, the best title was H.E.R.O - great little game, addictive, original& still as playable today as it was back then. In2nd place would be River Raid. #RetroGaming
5
3
9

Watching "War Games" from1983, wow, what a world.
No internet, few if any cell phones. Researching at the library using the card catalog and microfiche reader. Dialing up using a MODEM to communicate computer to computer.
The world has changed so much since then. Amazing.
